pr_title: Support cherry-pick for dynamic partition overwrites

timeline.message: Add support to cherry-pick dynamic partition overwrites.

timeline.bodyText: can we make replace-partitions property a static variable in SnaphotSummary.java?
timeline.author: prodeezy

timeline.bodyText: nit: do we need to depend on relocated Iterables for tests?
timeline.author: danielcweeks

replies.bodyText: Yes. The relocated dependency comes from our shaded module and we've excluded the unshaded version from our compile classpaths.
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: I guess I missed the relocated guava work.  I suppose this makes sense.
replies.author: danielcweeks
